DOC.brief_summary: This prospective study will assess Ozurdex in the treatment of Diabetic Macular Oedema in clinical practice.
DOC.brief_title: Study of OZURDEX® in the Treatment of Diabetic Macular Oedema (DME) in Australia - The AUSSIEDEX Study
DOC.criteria: Pseudophakic or phakic and scheduled for a cataract operation Macular oedema due to DME Previous Ozurdex® treatment
